sledgehammer.manager

Class PlayerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • sledgehammer.util.Printable
      • sledgehammer.manager.Manager
        • sledgehammer.manager.PlayerManager

  • public class PlayerManager
extends Manager
    Manager to handle Player data and operations for the Sledgehammer engine.
    Author:
    Jab

      • getPlayers

        public java.util.List<Player> getPlayers()
        Returns:
        Returns a List of Players registered in the PlayerManager.

      • getPlayer

        public Player getPlayer(java.lang.String username)
        Parameters:
        username - The String user-name of the Player.
        Returns:
        Returns a Player with the given String user-name. If no Player identifies with the String user-name, then null is returned.

      • getPlayer

        public Player getPlayer(java.util.UUID uniqueId)
        Parameters:
        uniqueId - The Unique ID of the Player.
        Returns:
        Returns a Player with the given Unique ID. If no Player identifies with the Unique ID, then null is returned.
